Putty.name: Trucare Wall Putty
Putty.description: Perfect the art of smooth walls, with our putty which will fill cracks and gaps, ensuring a perfect surface inside and out.

Putty.description: Perfect your finish with our water-based putty that fills imperfections and leaves a smooth, white base for your topcoat.

White-cement.name: Whitecement
White-cement.description: Birla White Cement is basically White Portland Cement that is made by using advanced technology and state-of-the-art manufacturing process, which gives superior fineness and whiteness.

White-cement.name: EVER-WHITE CEMENT WASH
White-cement.description: Birla White Ever White Cement Wash is a first-of-its-kind cement wash that is exceptionally durable, superbly lustrous, and gives an economical wall finish.

Wall-care.name: WALLCARE PUTTY
Wall-care.description: Birla White WallCare Putty is known to be India’s Asli Aur Sabse Safed Putty. It is a white cement-based, water-resistant, white wall putty that ensures a strong binding with building surfaces, a smooth finish, extensive coverage, superior refractive index, and paint-friendliness.

Wall-care.name: WALLSEAL WATERPROOF PUTTY
Wall-care.description: Birla White WallSeal Waterproof Putty is a white cement-based putty with 2x water resistance and Active German Silicon Polymers which provides a strong base on a plaster/concrete and mortar wall surface before application of topcoat paint or distemper and protects your walls from water.
